title: "DeepMind’s AI used to develop tiny ‘syringe’ for injecting gene therapy and tumor-killing drugs"
excerpt: "Scientists have developed a molecular “syringe” that can inject proteins, including cancer-killing drugs and gene therapies, directly into human cells. And the researchers did it using an artificial intelligence (AI) program made by Google’s DeepMind."
